titleStmt.title: An elogy upon the much lamented death of Mr Luke Fawne, junior, who dyed the sixth of January, 1650. being ten years, six moneths, and four days old.
titleStmt.author: Tutchin, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "I'm big with Grief, That I can onely vent".
Signed at end: Robertus Tutchein [i.e. Robert Tutchin].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
